```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
```

## Comenzando

Comenzamos

```{r readData}
data <- read.csv("~/Consultas/datosBIEN.csv")
data_replay <- data[data$ReplayID==266,]
```

Vamos a dibujar algo

```{r dibujo1}
gg <- ggplot(data_replay, aes(Frame)) +
geom_line(aes(y=Minerals, colour = as.factor(Winner))) +
geom_line(aes(y=EnemyMinerals, colour = as.factor(-Winner)))

gg

ggplotly(gg)

```
